about_the_game:
About the Game
FMV Soulslike is the best FMV game; that was never made

Described as an unholy union of retro nostalgic FMV style atop a modern day soulslike design- a truly unforgettable adventure awaits.

The story so far
In the not too distant future, 2007: special agent Candice Deak, is sent to investigate missing persons report coming from the “Club Seamön, fashion mall.” Upon reaching the mall he discovers it has been converted to a horrible game. “The one wish tournament.” Those that survive the tournament get 1 wish.

Find your role
Find and unlock playable classes along your journey. Mix and match them to find the playstyle that fits your best
  • Gun Slinger
    • Specializes in gunplay and mobility. Bonus damage for stunning several enemies in a row. (Think old school shootout western)
  • Deadman
    • Harness the power of the afterlife and become the Deadman. A high risk / high reward warrior class. Deal devastating amounts of damage at the cost of lower health.
  • Pale Samurai
    • Melee focus, Killing enemies with melee makes your next shot a guaranteed crit. Leave a trail of fallen enemies by chaining together melee and ranged attacks.


Up your arsenal
Blast your enemies with a variety of weapons including pistols, shotguns, machine guns and swords. Be sure scour out the hidden legendary weapons that lie in wait.

Uniquely themed levels
Levels so uniquely themed; you'll go sleepless nights as your brain tries to process what you just saw:
  • Abandoned Museum
  • Knightly's Arcade & Pizzeria
  • Thrift Store Nightmare
  • 90's Sewer
  • The Future

Got what it takes?
Only the most determined can complete "The one wish tournament." Just make sure price is one you're will you pay.

content_descriptors.notes: Poorly simulated over the top violence. Gunshots and limb dismemberment.
